downloadTitle: Cancelling a project (without cancelling your career)
downloadDescription: Discusses best practices for recognizing when a project should be cancelled and the benefits of doing so.

downloadFile.name: Cancelling a project without cancelling your career.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/c/b/ecbe9a96-03c5-4502-a4b8-96ce3c9b65be/Cancelling a project without cancelling your career.docx

detailsSection: This white paper is written by Chris Vandersluis of HMS Software and describes best practices for recognizing when a project should be cancelled and the benefits of doing so.
detailsSection_file_name: Cancelling a project without cancelling your career.docx
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
